title: Finesse CMS
description: Explore the comprehensive features and technologies behind the Finesse Content Management System (CMS).

body.raw: ## Introduction Designed to simplify content management and administration, Finesse CMS is an advanced and robust content management system. It provides a user-friendly interface and enables users to manage different parts of their digital content, such as inventory and billboards, with ease. ## Features Finesse CMS encompasses the following key entities: - Billboards: Dynamic advertising spaces to grab user attention. - Categories: Organizational units for content structuring. - Sizes: Management of product sizes and variations. - Manufacturers: Database of product manufacturers and suppliers. - Inventory: Real-time tracking and control of stock levels. - Orders: Comprehensive order management and processing. - Settings: Customizable configurations to modify the CMS. All of these ideas are pretty much fully implemented. ## API Routes Finesse CMS leverages API routes to enable efficient data communication. These routes facilitate the interaction between the front-end and back-end, ensuring the smooth operation of the system. ## Technologies This Content Management System is fully built with [NextJs](https://Nextjs.org) and [React.js](https://reactjs.org). It also uses [Tailwind CSS](https://tailwindcss.com) for the styling of the app, Tailwind CSS allows me to easily create amazing looking styles fast! ## Full tech stack ### Frontend - React.js - NextJs - Shadcn UI - Tailwind CSS ### API - NodeJs - Axios - Zustand - PlanetScale - Prisma ### Other - ESLint - Prettier - TypeScript
